content: Make bedtime more caliente by dressing up as a spicy latin dancer with the flamenco dress duvet cover. The design on this puffy comforter features an attention-grabbing red and black flamenco piece adorned with white polka dots that any little girl would love.

Life is too short to spend sober – that’s why the Ultimate Party Travel Guide is here to show you the best party spots on the planet. From pub crawls to beach parties, the guide shows you over 100 of the world’s best places to get completely wasted.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Body Paint
content: Stand out from the crowd of weirdos at Burning Man with a crazy outfit courtesy of some glow in the dark body paint. You’ll be able to unleash your imagination and create jaw-dropping luminescent designs that won’t fade as you dance and sweat the night away.

Take the sting off your favorite shot by chugging down your liquor in a frosty ice shot glass. The specially designed silicone ice tray makes small 1-ounce shot glasses that’ll ensure your drink stays icy cold as it makes its way to an old friend – your liver.

Indulge your offspring’s need for speed by getting them behind the wheel of the Mario Kart toy car. Just like the plump Italian racer, they’ll be able to whiz by the other kids at the park as they floor it and reach blinding speeds of three miles per hour.

Annihilate the opposition when you unleash the fury of the paintball machine gun. With this deadly weapon in your arsenal, you’ll be able to release a rampage of epic proportions that’ll guarantee no one is left unmarked when it’s all over.

Beat the Tatooine-like summer heat by lounging around on the Star Wars Landspeeder pool float. Modeled after Luke’s trusty Landspeeder, it’s over five feet long and designed to safely float you around every inch of the pool.

Taste the nutritious rainbow by sampling the delicious products grown from the rainbow carrot seeds. Upon plucking these carrots from your technicolor garden, your culinary creations take on new life as they make any dish pop with more than just flavor.

Keep your room tidy with ninja-like precision by using the ninja star wall hooks to make sure everything stays in its rightful place. Once you skillfully throw the star and lodge it into the wall, its star-like shape lends itself as a great hanging spot for just about anything.

Make your outfit pop by accessorizing with the eye-catching faceless LED watch. Instead of looking at a standard display, the watch’s bold design showcases the time right on the band itself for an understated yet modern look that is sure to get you noticed.

Avoid making the costly mistake of drinking warm beer with help from the beer koozie thermometer. New fangled technology combines with the the tried and true koozie so that you can know your beer’s temperature before you guzzle it down.

Keep your best buddy close at all times with the pet ghost in a bottle. This pet requires minimal upkeep and emits ghoulish sounds every so often so you never feel like you’re completely alone. Finally, a pet that won’t die if you forget to feed it – because it’s already dead!

Conventional pets are overrated. The remote control caterpillar will crawl its way into your heart the moment your turn it on! Each remote controlled critter comes in a bright and lively design that is perfect for freaking out your squeamish friends.

Stay connected at all times with the Samsung smart watch. It goes above and beyond your smartphone by providing you with real time alerts you can see without having to search your purse or pocket. It’s convenience at its finest so you never miss a beat.

Fool everyone into thinking you’re packing heat with the revolver gun knife. Cleverly disguised as a classic revolver – complete with hardwood handle and sheriff’s badge – it folds out into a unique knife as functional as it is decorative.

Catch some cancerous sun rays and enjoy the water while you socialize with bestest buddies on the ten person circular float. The float’s circular shape works perfectly for talking to others and also features a large central mesh deck for additional seating.

titleEN: Everything I Want To Do Is Illegal Book
content: Learn about what you’re actually putting into your mouth with the humorous and educational “Everything I Want To Do Is Illegal” book. This informative read illustrates how bureaucrats control the food industry, favoring industrial, global corporate food systems.

Give your fishy friends a birds eye view of the pad by moving them into the wall mounted fish aquarium. Hanging from the wall, they’ll be able to appreciate the grandeur of your home while remaining safe from potential feline predators.

Explore the Land of Ooo along with Finn and Jake with the Adventure Time encyclopedia. The booklet comes jam packed with everything you ever wanted to know about all of your favorite characters, such as Princess Bubblegum and the Ice King.

Astound nearby campers as you make your campfire roar to life with the rainbow fire packets. Once sprinkled into the fire, the flames will begin to glow incredibly bright and magically change colors right before your eyes – without the use of mind altering drugs!

When Wall-E isn’t helping fat people off floaties, he’s helping light your home. With the flick of a switch, the Wall-E lamp shines bright and lights up your child’s imagination, creating a relaxing environment in any part of the home.

Enjoy the sights of Poseidon’s underwater kingdom without ever having to submerge your head underwater with the snorkeling kickboard. The kickboard keeps you comfortably afloat while a 14″ x 9″ window provides an incredible panoramic view below.

Get serious about the production quality of your homemade sex tapes with this ultra high resolution 4K camera. Featuring a built in touchscreen that lets you monitor and change settings as you shoot,  it provides an unparalleled level of quality.

Combine your two greatest passions into one compact and enabling package with the hockey puck bottle opener. With a maple leaf emblazoned on one side and bottle opener on the other, it’s the most Canadian way possible to pop open a maple lager.

Make your already frosty brew even more refreshing by topping it off using the beer slushie machine. An ideal purchase for the beer enthusiast who has everything, the machine complements your beer with a flavorful layer of thick and creamy frosting of booze.

Light up the town when you take a ride on the glow in the dark bicycle. While the bright yellow frame looks stunning under the sun, the specialized paint glows bright for hours at night, so you can dazzle others and keep yourself safe while riding in the dark.

Stop counting calories and start counting change when you keep your money in the hamburger wallet. This scrumptious looking wallet safely houses your cash, credit cards, and ID in a hamburger shaped pouch that is perfect for any junk food junkie.

Put Grandma’s chocolate-chip pancakes to shame as you one-up her with the pig pancake pan. This adorable non-stick pan creates fluffy pig shaped pancakes that make excellent companions to your heaping servings of bacon.

Conceal your top secret messages from nosey strangers by writing with these blacklight markers. Under regular light the ink from the marker remains invisible – but when it’s placed under UV blacklights, they visibly come to life.

Illuminate the world around you with the wireless lighting strips. Available in almost every color under the sun, these smartphone app controlled wireless lighting strips will forever change the way you light up your home or office.

Relax in total style when you lay your weary bones down on the hanging curve chair. The chair’s stunning design provides utmost comfort as your body conforms to the gentle curves of the chair while the hanging suspension provides a soothing rocking motion.

Enjoy a golden crispy slice of toast while roughing it in the wild with the camp stove toaster. With a design that’s as efficient as it is lightweight and portable, it let’s you cook up to four pieces of toast at a time so everyone at the campsite can enjoy a tasty breakfast.

Bring the fun of the arcade straight into your living room with the basketball arcade game. Featuring 2 heavy duty pro-style rims and 7 basketballs, you can play til your hearts content or go head to head against a worthy foe until one emerges victorious.

Take down your intended targets with style while using the 24K gold airsoft pistol. This high quality airsoft pistol is not only fun to use but makes a wonderful collector’s item thanks to its unique 24K gold plating and matte black magazine.

Hone your ninjitsu skills while transferring your data with the aid of the ninja star USB. With a sleek black design ideal for camouflaging among the other office equipment, the USB will dish out justice as it saves your precious files.

Ditch the decaf and go for the hard stuff with this rocket fuel coffee drip. Designed as the lower half of a rocket ship, the coffee drip sits atop the mug and slowly drips the perfect cup of coffee to help you blast off into a highly alert state of mind.

Light up your grill faster than the human torch when you use the ultimate fire lighter. Capable of blasting a 2600 degree Fahrenheit flame at the pull of a trigger, the lighter requires no aid from lighter fluids and features a built in fan to help speed up the heating process.

Relax, reflect, and get your daily priorities into focus as you sip from the white camera lens coffee mug. This custom made mug features a ceramic body that is designed to resemble a high quality camera lens design that photography enthusiasts will appreciate.

Break your personal speed record while being towed on the multi-person oval tube. The unconventional shape of the tube allows you to cruise through the water with less aerodynamic drag for the fastest and wildest ride you’ve ever experienced.

Enjoy a mouth-watering steak wherever your travels take you as long as you’ve got the portable gas grill. The ultra compact design allows the grill to be carried conveniently like a handbag and is gas powered so you can get cooking fast.

The 28 port USB hub is the one hub to rule them all! Never again will you be short on USB ports. With 28 separate USB ports built into this mammoth hub, you’ll be able to connect every electronic device within a 5 mile radius – and still have room for more.

Start thinking of a good wish because with the Dragon Ball Z set in your possession, anything is possible. After decades of searching the globe, the seven dragon balls have finally been tracked and are ready to be used – immortality is finally yours!

Send your taste buds on a delicious interplanetary journey when you bite into a 3D spaceship cookie. With the spaceship 3D cookie cutters your treats will blast off the baking pan and embark on a heroic mission to land on the surface of your tongue.

Place a touch of surrealism to your drab home decor with the melting clock. Inspired by Salvador Dali’s iconic painting, this designer clock functions as both a timepiece and a fun, decorative art conversation starter for your humble abode.

Kick your ADD into high gear when you take the Transformers pen to work or school. Just like the Transformers, there’s more to this pen than meets the eye – providing you with a fully functional pen, and doubling as a kick-ass action figure.

Get one step closer to having telekinetic powers with the muscle contraction armband. The armband allows you to capture the electrical activity of your underdeveloped muscles to wirelessly control a plethora of devices such as your PC or smartphone.

Sonic is back and he’s here to join you for your morning cup of Joe! The Sonic the Hedgehog mug comes decorated with a scene from the classic Sega Genesis game that comes to life when you move the mug from side to side.

Get your kids excited about having healthy teeth by using this cupcake flavored toothpaste! Just like the name suggests, this novelty toothpaste tastes like delicious homemade cupcakes and makes brushing your teeth a delightful experience.

Make the outdoors a little more bearable by converting your rudimentary campsite into a labyrinth of tents with the infinitely modular tent system. The tent’s unique design allows campers to extend the size and complexity of their campsite with their fellow neighbors.

Conceal a lot more than just your private parts when you try on the gun holster bra strap. Compact and lightweight, the holster conveniently secures around the front of the bra to allow for easy access without posing any risk of accidentally shooting your tits off.

Hop aboard the organic bandwagon next time you’re looking to get hammered with the organic craft beer guide. This informative book provides brewers of all skill levels with everything they need to brew the healthiest and best tasting beer in town.

Help Nintendo squeeze every last penny out of their flagship franchise by purchasing the Super Mario Bros level creator/editor for the Wii U. Using the Wii U controller, you’ll be able to build and tweak levels of the Mushroom Kingdom to your hearts content.

Help make your boots nearly indestructible by lacing them up with the unbreakable shoelaces. Made from a patented formula, the shoelaces are long enough to be strung across your toughest boots and can stand up to fires and scissors without losing functional integrity.

Make it rain in your shower with this adorably sexy stripper sloth shower curtain. But be warned, when Lisa the sloth takes to the stage she’s anything but lazy. This head turning sloth has sultry moves and loves to climb – for the money.

You may not be able to blow shit up with your mind – yet – but you can now at least control a helicopter. The mind controlled helicopter is the high-tech toy that allows you to control it by strapping on a head band and letting your brain do all the heavy lifting.

If you haven’t already tapped into the world of craft beer, the “Craft Beer Revolution” book will bring you up to speed on everything you need to know, and then some! It chronicles the movement from the early 1980s to the worldwide phenomenon it has become today.

It’s been said that ants do some of their best work at night. Put this theory to the test with illuminated ant farm. The glowing design of the farm not only looks neat but also provides a unique view of how your curious ants discover and explore their new home.

Get a serious upper body workout while capturing stunning photos with help from the ultra-telephoto zoom lens. Whether your intended object of interest is standing close by or happens to be a few miles away, this behemoth of a zoom lens will get the shot.

Make sure Mr. Fluffums is always looking purrrfectly professional with the business cat tie. Whether it’s a business meeting, wedding, or just a viewing of a new age rendition of ‘Of Mice and Men’ – the cat tie will ensure he’s looking downright dapper.

The breakfast game dun changed – and everything you thought you knew about the most important meal of the day is about to shift.  With this revolutionary dual breakfast sandwich maker you’ll be able to create a scrumptious meal for two in just five short minutes.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Playing Cards
content: Add an interesting spin to poker night by playing with the glow in the dark playing cards. Simply place them under UV lights, and watch as this seemingly normal deck transforms into a glow in the dark set of truly captivating visuals.

Stay pruny while you get drunk at the local clubhouse pool with this floating cooler. The floating base features six convenient cup holders and houses the large cooler full of drinks that you can pass to underage kids who’ll put up with your belligerent stories of past glory.

Connect with Mother Nature while jotting down notes and quick reminders with these leaf sticky notes. The creative Earthy design disguises each note as a lush green leaf, adding a natural decor to any environment even while not in use.

Take a power while on the job in the most professional way possible with the neck tie pillow. Designed for the dedicated businessman who works long hours and even holidays, the tie features a built in pillow you can use for a re-energizing power nap.

Blaze up the night skies by playing a radical game with the light up frisbee. This luminescent flying disk whizzes through the air while creating amazing effects with the array of neon colors strewn all along the surface.

Wake up to your own personal Pokemon by slipping on a pair of these fuzzy unisex Pikachu slippers every morning. Perfect for Pokemon fans of all ages, the only thing that surpasses their comfort is their level of cuteness.

Kick the party into high gear by hyping people up with some high octane booze served in these flashing shot glasses. As soon as the liquor hits the bottom of the shot glass, the bright flashing lights activate to get you into the party spirit – or  possibly induce a seizure.

Stun every beachgoer in sight when you show up dressed up in the Wonder Woman bikini. Be warned though, after you step outside dressed in this heroicly iconic uniform, you’ll need an invisible jet to escape the hordes of fan boys drooling over you.

Look around. You may not know it, but at this very moment you’re surrounded by idiots, and the “Idiots Are Everywhere” book will help you identify them. Filled with anecdotes and helpful tips about these clueless individuals, you’ll become a pro at spotting them out.

Keep your chips as fresh as the day you first opened them by using the potato chip bag resealer. With one simple swipe along the open end of the bag, this handy little device creates an air-tight seal that keeps the delicious contents fresh and crunchy.

titleEN: How To Be A Man Book
content: Learn the ins and outs of how to be a proper gentleman with guidance from the How To Be A Man book. Just because you’re born with a y-chromosome and a floppy meatstick doesn’t make you a real man – but after reading this informative book, you will be!

Leap higher than you ever thought possible by strapping on these extreme jumping stilts. These acrobatic stilts are specially designed to allow for a wide range of athletic maneuvers while soaring up to sixteen feet in the air!

Hey maaannn, make sure your pad stays looking out of sight with any one of the groovy lava lamps. This retro decor provides subtle ambient lighting for any occasion while the funky colored lava inside hypnotizes you with it’s soothing slow moving blobs.

Babies – everyone hates them and no one knows why we make them – but what can we do to silence them while they use their vocal cords like a wounded velociraptor crying out for reinforcements? The answer is simple: insert the “mute button” pacifier.

titleEN: Your Cat Is Plotting To Kill You Book
content: Felines are conniving creatures by nature. So stay one step ahead of that fluffy ball of destruction by reading the “How To Tell If Your Cat is Plotting To Kill You” book. This informative and comical book teaches you all of the warning signs of imminent doom.

Create an F5 level of excitement in the classroom with the tornado demonstration machine. This educational machine provides an entertaining way of teaching students about this amazing weather phenomena in a way that’s fun and easy to understand.

Capture some brilliant footage on your next outing by strapping on the GoPro dual camera case. This versatile and waterproof case allows you to strap on two separate GoPro cameras and film simultaneously so you always get the perfect shot.

Breathe new life into your fishy friend’s abode by upgrading their pad to the glow in the dark aquarium. With this unique kit you’ll be able to decorate your aquarium with specialized props that glow bright when placed under a black light.

Stay connected during your next wilderness excursion by taking along the solar panel USB charger. This compact charger easily mounts to the surface of your backpack to absorb sunlight that you can utilize to charge your phone, gps device, and portable HD TV.

Show your support for the Rebel Alliance in the kitchen with the Star Wars X-Wing knife block. Designed to look like the iconic X-Wing fighter, its capable of storing up to five high quality stainless steel knives. It’s the perfect gift for any Star Wars loving chef.

Put your taste buds and fragile anus through the ring of fire by preparing meals with help from the sriracha cookbook. You’ll have dozens of fiery recipes at your disposal so no matter what you’re in the mood to eat, you can season it with sriracha!

Create a memory of a lifetime by lighting up the night sky with flying sky lanterns. Perfect for any event, these beautiful mini hot air balloons illuminate the dark skies as they make their way up and take their place among the stars.

Make the most out of your horrible living conditions with the inflatable car bed. This versatile resting aid will pop up in minutes and provide you the highest level of comfort while you cry yourself to sleep and reminisce over better days.

Keep your tunes close to you no matter how many galaxies you travel through with the Star Wars themed headphones. With designs representing everyone from the light to the dark side, they’ll deliver crisp and clear sound every time.

Transform your sober pool into a tropical paradise in a snap with the floating tiki bar. In a few short minutes the bar inflates complete with a wrap around counter and a tiki styled roof that brings all the fun of a vacation  to your own backyard pool.

Make the most of your morning shower by brushing up on some global geography with the world map shower curtain. Even if you choose to ignore the educational value altogether, the vibrant colors of the map make for a great way to liven up your bathroom’s decor.

Experience the joy of owning your very own Bluesmobile when you take it upon yourself to build the Blues Brothers LEGO set. Complete with the iconic cop car design with the ginormous speaker mounted on the roof, it’s a must have for any fan.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Direwolf USB Drive
content: Only the Game of Thrones Direwolf USB drive can be entrusted to keep your valuable information safe. The 64GB USB is intricately sheathed by a Direwolf waterproof case made from a strong alloy that’ll make your USB virtually indestructible.

Hate all the horrible things this world has to offer with the I Hate Everything book. It’s page after page of humorously drawn objects of things the author hates along with a detailed list of everything else to hate in this world like change or poetry.

Take control of your life by making a bold statement to the universe with the “F*ck The Time” watch! You’ve been a slave to time your whole life – but now you’re the one cracking the whip when you wear this authoritative wristwatch. You’re move, Father Time.

Top off the perfect cocktail with a couple hexagon ice cubes and people will take notice of your superb bartending skills. The hexagon ice cube tray is made from a durable non-toxic silicone that makes it a breeze to pop the ice cubes out.

Replay all the classic games of your childhood with this convenient pocket Super Nintendo console! Ditching the big bulky design, this console is shaped like the original controller of a Super Nintendo. It’s the perfect gift for old school gamers.

The floating pool speaker delivers your favorite tunes right where all the action is without shorting out when it gets splashed by a bit of water. The speaker connects wirelessly through Bluetooth and floats along the water’s surface providing excellent sound quality.

It’s a wild, wet, and incredibly fun free for all when the inflatable water rocker makes an appearance at your local lake or waterpark. This colossal rocker is big enough to hold up to eight people as it wobbles in every direction until only one lone survivor remains.

Stop counting calories and start indulging your sweet tooth with a sizable dessert served on the double scoop ice cream cone. The cone’s gratuitous design allows you to enjoy two delicious scoops that won’t fall over – like they normally do when stacked vertically.

To truly appreciate your music, you need well calibrated instruments of destruction – such as these bullet earbuds. These precision headphones are shaped like 9mm bullets and feature silicone hollow points with noise cancelling technology.

Disguise your weapon in the ammo of another weapon with the .50 caliber bullet folding knife. Traditionally used for sniper rifles, this .50 caliber bullet has been modified to house a sleek 4″ blade for jobs that requires a more up-close and personal touch.

Enjoy great food while taking in the great outdoors by following the recipes in the Campfire Cuisine book. This handy book teaches you how to prepare mouth-watering  campfire meals using only what you have on your person.

Battle boredom in the workplace by stocking up on the LEGO brick eraser set – office supplies that doubles as toys. Sure they’ll correct your writing errors, but the real fun of these LEGO erasers comes from playing with them as if they were your own toys!

Keep the unruly pile of papers at your desk organized by thrusting the weight of the universe onto it with the planetary paperweight. This compact paperweight will keep documents stationary while providing you with a stunning view of our solar system.
